ai-patthana16.82:0.2_0: Having given the immaculateness of the Dhamma
ai-patthana16.82:0.3_0: for one who is attached to harmful things, and for the sake of a comprehension.
ai-patthana16.82:1.1_0: One doesn’t give rise to thoughts of insisting on harming.
ai-patthana16.82:1.1_1: Not being repulsive to the teaching, nor harmlessness arises. ...
ai-patthana16.82:1.1_2: Such thoughts don’t give rise to the teachings, and don’t get rid of repulsion.
ai-patthana16.82:1.1_3: This is the section in brief.
ai-patthana16.82:3.1_0: One doesn’t give rise to thoughts of insisting on harming.
ai-patthana16.82:3.1_1: One doesn’t give rise to thoughts of not impingement, nor thinking: ‘This is a cause for the sake of repulsion.’
ai-patthana16.82:3.1_2: Such thoughts don’t give rise to the teachings, and don’t get rid of repulsion.
ai-patthana16.82:3.1_3: This is the section in brief.
